reference_summary:
Savon de Marseille, Jasmine fragrance, 5.3 Oz Bar soap, Marius Fabre
Marius Fabre
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Marius Fabre', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '5.3 Ounce', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 1 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'HB150JA'}
The bar is rather small..but the jasmine is overly pungent! In a good way..I'm wondering could it be chemically enhanced? Most jasmine's are rather light in nature. Regardless this bar is for a special occasion like my birthday 2015
blooms in jasmine
Optimum Salon Haircare Damage Antidote Oil Moisturizer 8.5 oz
Soft-Sheen Carson
{'Material Type Free': 'Aluminum Free', 'Liquid Volume': '8.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Soft-Sheen Carson', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 2.5 x 1.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '755332133307 796433040804 075285008492 784190441354'}
I bought this product last year in 2014 at a local CVS pharmacy store. I like this product but I must warn African females (black) this product does leave a residue..so if you use this lotion daily..always brush your hair out. From the scalp to the ends...it reminds me of the "jerri curl" products from the 1980's. Over all my hair did not dry out and it stayed moisturized for atleast 2-3 before re-applying. If you use a pressing comb or hot curling iron dont mix this product with heat..if you desire a Donna Summers look this is perfect..
Better than a perm any day..
Venezia Soapworks Moisturizing Soap Rose - 7oz
Venezia
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Venezia', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2.8 x 1.7 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '796433748755 895697010100 787461525142'}
This bar I purchased because I wanted to collect a rose scented bar from this company. When I'm in a mood for "florals" I scan amazon for certain scents of soaps. The reviews were reasonable regarding this brand. Only time will tell will I repeat my purchase.
A little piece of italy...I think?

profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Fragrance Preference:** The user has a strong preference for floral scents, particularly jasmine and rose, with a continued emphasis on exceptional and intense fragrances that stand out, indicating a desire for memorable olfactory experiences.

- **Product Form:** The user remains committed to bar soaps, showcasing a consistent loyalty to traditional forms of personal care. Their recent purchase reflects both a desire for luxury and practicality, as they appreciate quality craftsmanship.

- **Context of Use:** The user favors luxurious yet effective products for both special occasions and everyday use, aligning with their focus on enhancing hair and skin health while providing a sensory indulgence.

- **Brand Affinity:** The user demonstrates a strong preference for reputable brands known for quality, with a history of selecting top-tier luxury soap makers. This highlights their conscientious approach to personal care and brand loyalty.

- **Product Evaluation:** The user consistently rates products positively and values thoughtful evaluation, indicating a discerning eye for quality. Their reviews illustrate a preference for distinctive and well-reviewed items that align with their luxury standards.

- **Sensory Experience:** The user seeks products that deliver rich sensory experiences, prioritizing aromas that create lasting impressions. Their focus is on the overall performance of products to enhance personal enjoyment.

Overall, this user values high-quality, luxurious personal care items in traditional forms, enjoys exploring floral fragrances, and remains dedicated to finding distinctive and effective products for both everyday and special occasions.
